name: Youtuber Survivors
description:
Youtuber Survivors is a 2D rogue-lite, Beat 'em up style action game where you must team up with various YouTubers such as fitness, piano, and gaming YouTubers to survive. Players can execute combo attacks with a one button controls, and a variety of fun and interesting techniques add to the enjoyment of playing the game.

Key features:


  • A cartoon-like story filled with humor
  • Easy One button combo system.
  • Level up and choose traits from a selection to power up your character! Rogue like!
  • Unlock permanent trait for your character! Rogue lite!
  • Fast-paced and exhilarating action !
